title: RockyEscape.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
Oh hello
I didn't expect to see you here
but I told your friend over there to at least try to remain hidden
I guess the secret's out
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
what secret?
That you were going to escape without the rest of us?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
I don't know, probably
Escape, from a place like this, isn't impossible
however
progress on our tunnel here has been incredibly slow
to the point where I don't think we will ever make it
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
Ok, I can help, we can all help
there's other people in our camp, we could all get out!
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
ah shhh shhh
I know, you're enthusiastic about this
the end may be in sight, but it's still so far away
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
what's stopping us from all digging this thing now?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
Folks talk, folks are ... pursuaded to talk
you need to know whom you can trust
[[...|RockyEscape.QuestionMenu]]

title: RockyEscape.DigLengthQuestion
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
How long are we supposed to dig?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
It's somewhere between 500 and 600 meters of rock
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
What!?!? that's....
...that's almost impossible
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
Most escape attempts fail because people can't get through the rock
It's too much for them, they get found out or die from something else
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
Five hundred meters, that will take
months?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
If you can convince more people to join
that'll certainly make quicker work of it
[[...|RockyEscape.QuestionMenu]]

title: RockyEscape.LifeForceQuestion
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
So how do we dig this thing?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
well, there's a reason 
The ground we're on is pretty hard
and the rock we have to dig through is really hard
it'll really strain anyone who attempts to dig through it
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
like, how?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
anyone who tries to dig will lose some HP
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
like hitpoints?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
something like that
[[...|RockyEscape.QuestionMenu]]

title: RockyEscape.InventoryQuestion
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
I come to you every few days for upgrades
why not just give us everything we need right away?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
Well, they've determined that high price equipment is a privelage
a privelage for the lucky few who live long enough
why waste the money on someone who's going to die
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
but, they'd get a better yeild, more of us would survive
surely it would be cheaper to give us better equipment
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
I don't know how economics work!
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
but, you're a shop keeper aren't you?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
yes, we would make more if you had better shovels, swords, maybe even guns
but the fact is, the thought of losing a valuable piece of equipment to them is...
unbearable
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
but, we're living things, you can't tell me they value inanimate objects over us...
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
I mean...look around my dear
[[...|RockyEscape.QuestionMenu]]

title: RockyEscape.QuestionMenu
body:
Any other questions for me
[[Yeah, how much do we need to dig?|RockyEscape.DigLengthQuestion]]
[[How difficult will it be to dig?|RockyEscape.LifeForceQuestion]]
[[You're the shopkeeper, why can't I get better stuff?|RockyEscape.InventoryQuestion]]
[[No, I want to start digging|RockyEscape.ResolveDialog]]

title: RockyEscape.ResolveDialog
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
Ok. Just walk up to the thing and dig
Our associate here will also help
<<set $escape_active to true>>
<<setPlayerStartEscapeFlag CampAreaSecretEscape>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_silent>>
Are you gonna fuckin help?
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer rocky_default_talking>>
oh uhh, absolutly
